thread.title: BRIEF-Bluedon Information Security Technologies To Boost Unit's Capital By 400 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bluedon Information Security Technologies To Boost Unit's Capital By 400 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-bluedon information security technologies to boost unit
bluedon information security technologies co ltd

text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Bluedon Information Security Technologies Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BOOST UNIT'S CAPITAL BY 400 MILLION YUAN TO 500 MILLION YUAN ($79.06 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HOAokO Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3240 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
